ec20c822a102896281bc9864f76d2677b1f2b2d3.commitMessage: Issue #2818: Add support for lambda expression in LeftCurlyCheck

0d8e93ce79ea33b72b3e904d8796984271ee3d8d.commitMessage: minor: enforce FinalLocalVariableCheck on checkstyle code

8a3f5bf6d5389b9e175c9c769992faece6d76ada.commitMessage:
Remove unused assignments. #1555

Fixes UnusedAssignment inspection violations.

Description:
>This inspection points out the cases where a variable value is never used after its assignment, i.e.:
- the variable never gets read after assignment OR
- the value is always overwritten with another assignment before the next variable read OR
 - the variable initializer is redundant (for one of the above two reasons) OR
 - the variable is never used.

71d0a829e42bfcbfa3fd692a29abf8796e467fc9.commitMessage: Coverage has been increased t0 100% in LeftCurlyCheck. Issue #1291

9399831eea63a990db0ea0897115ec05f2b149c0.commitMessage: Extend LeftCurly check to verify static initializers, issue #966

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

501b7c5240705c6db756608618fdcf58189e807e.commitMessage:
Repair Sonarqube problems found in Checkstyle for issue #46

 Fixes for 'Modifiers should be declared in the correct order', 'Redundant casts should not be used' and 'Array designators "[]" should be on the type, not the variable'

ad34b2a35eff0dba70ef5b27a0ff361520b66bea.commitMessage: Fixed the LeftCurly check to ignore leading annotations. Thanks to Tim Carpenter for patch #2506439. An excellent quality patch.

d62a2cc02092cb6c1a1666630a51a6ec7c50a878.commitMessage: Inspired by patch# 2111354 - changes to remove casting. Neat trick

f59c0a0a977e1df10ac9897179c3d29d98360158.commitMessage: fixed NPE in LeftCurlyCheck that occured with JDK 1.5 enums (bug #1113946)

d2fb67faae0b56340678abef1d1ecedf1df8bb95.commitMessage: Fix for 866501 (Inconsistent lcurly new line on wrap). Some grammar changes made to fix this problem.

f50c47545a5bcdaf1facb2aaf88adeda15594007.commitMessage: Refactored all the LeftCurly checks into one

4a5ccfb6fe4d4d2cf9d74419b3292bbb46ad4149.commitMessage: Bug fix the handling of '{'. Demonstrates the power of using findFirstToken().

eecd476fa8c6dba62f919a5ff1740d108848c867.commitMessage: moved static AST helpers in Util to DetailAST

84eddc36730c1eca845257201c71a0d1fb2d40cf.commitMessage:
Added a new class TokenTypes that contains all the type constants. This class
breaks the circular dependencies - the cost is needing to maintain this class
when a new grammar is introduced.

5fd3fab179d700d68281fee316519fdd907bbcd6.commitMessage:
Stopped the tokens LPAREN and RPAREN being silently eaten by the grammar. Now
need to implement the ParenPad check. Should be easy.

Also need to refactor some the existing tests to use utility methods for
locating tokens in the tree. Currently hard code the positions, which is not
ideal.

1bba9f0056f13a18be51d41e6d9c8645ed04343e.commitMessage: removed old implementation of Other Left Curly Check
